Description: Adze in the form of a bronze blade inscribed with the prenomen and epithet of Thutmose III in incised Hieroglyphs and a splayed cutting-edge tied to the wooden haft with a leather thong covered with linen.
Curator's comments: PM I Part 2: p.554 PM II (2): p.381
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1989 Jan-Mar, South Florida Science Museum, Imhotep's Egypt: Discovering Ancient Egyptian Technology 1989 Apr-Jun, Miami, Museum of Science, Imhotep's Egypt: Discovering Ancient Egyptian Technology 1989 Jul-Aug, Jacksonville Museum of Science History, Imhotep's Egypt: Discovering Ancient Egyptian Technology
